name: encounter
description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Composition](composition.html): Context of the Composition
* [DeviceRequest](devicerequest.html): Encounter or Episode during which request was created
* [DiagnosticReport](diagnosticreport.html): The Encounter when the order was made
* [DocumentReference](documentreference.html): Context of the document  content
* [Flag](flag.html): Alert relevant during encounter
* [List](list.html): Context in which list created
* [Observation](observation.html): Encounter related to the observation
* [Procedure](procedure.html): Search by encounter
* [RiskAssessment](riskassessment.html): Where was assessment performed?
* [ServiceRequest](servicerequest.html): An encounter in which this request is made
* [VisionPrescription](visionprescription.html): Return prescriptions with this encounter identifier
expression: Composition.encounter | DeviceRequest.context | DiagnosticReport.context.where(resolve() is Encounter) | DocumentReference.context.encounter | Flag.encounter | List.encounter | Observation.encounter | Procedure.context.where(resolve() is Encounter) | RiskAssessment.context.where(resolve() is Encounter) | ServiceRequest.context.where(resolve() is Encounter) | VisionPrescription.encounter
xpath: f:Composition/f:encounter | f:DeviceRequest/f:context | f:DiagnosticReport/f:context | f:DocumentReference/f:context/f:encounter | f:Flag/f:encounter | f:List/f:encounter | f:Observation/f:encounter | f:Procedure/f:context | f:RiskAssessment/f:context | f:ServiceRequest/f:context | f:VisionPrescription/f:encounter
